channel.title: WoW: Private Servers?
channel.description:
Umm could someone make a guide/tell me how to get on a World of Warcraft private server? Like is there something you need to change? I have it all installed and crap so yeh please help.
Or tell me how i can make my own (i dont want to open it for public i just want to mess around)
[size=10pt]-------[/size] EDIT! Well ... i had to do ALOT of searching and posting and reading and crap but i eventually found this: http://www.reaper-x.com/2007/04/19/how-to-configure-mangos-the-world-of-warcraft-emulator/
Just incase anyone else was interested in this.
Are there any other ones or can someone help me on msn?!!? - I have done everyhting the guide said and its not working.

item.title: WoW: Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I want to single player mine… cept with me allowing myself to be admin… then just run around playing.

[quote=“Newb 2341, post:2, topic:106808”]Nope.
No way.
You’d need EVERY file that Blizzard has to run one. Or have a downloaded client - like RS P servers.[/quote]

Idiot… I have every file that Blizzard has… because i have the game!!

[quote=“Doc. Booty, post:3, topic:106808”][quote author=Newb 2341 link=topic=152884.msg1444927#msg1444927 date=1181203570]
Nope.
No way.
You’d need EVERY file that Blizzard has to run one. Or have a downloaded client - like RS P servers.
[/quote]
Lies.

Gugle[/quote]

Well i have obviously search for it before asking the question… and maybe the fact that that digg was made like 2 years ago will explain why it isnt working!

Read full topic

item.title: WoW: Private Servers?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“teh spede, post:6, topic:106808”][quote author=Ca1lum link=topic=152884.msg1445991#msg1445991 date=1181232513]
I have played some just go to a wow private server website most of the time you need to download there pacths, setup accounts and what not on there website and you can play

[/quote]
He wants to make his own?[/quote]

Actually all he said was that he wants to get on one.

Read full topic
